DataElement.preferredName: PUI Or Case Process First Identification Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the process that the PUI or case was first identified.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Under Investigation Or Case Process First Identification
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who has been in close contact with a individual with a confirmed infection, or who may have been to a location of a disease outbreak and is exhibiting symptoms of the infection._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._A problem requiring investigation._A sequence of events which produces some outcome._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._The procedure of having an identity established.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Patient Under Investigation Or Case Process
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who has been in close contact with a individual with a confirmed infection, or who may have been to a location of a disease outbreak and is exhibiting symptoms of the infection.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:A problem requiring investigation.:A sequence of events which produces some outcome.

Concepts.definition: A person who has been in close contact with a individual with a confirmed infection, or who may have been to a location of a disease outbreak and is exhibiting symptoms of the infection.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
A sequence of events which produces some outcome.

Property.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:The procedure of having an identity established.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
The procedure of having an identity established.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A sequence of events which produces some outcome._The procedure of having an identity established._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

PermissibleValues.value: Clinical evaluation leading to PUI determination

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who has been in close contact with a individual with a confirmed infection, or who may have been to a location of a disease outbreak and is exhibiting symptoms of the infection.: An assessment of an individual's physical, mental, or emotional condition; information can be gathered from multiple sources, including physical exam, personal interview and observation, medical history, laboratory and imaging tests.

Concepts.definition: A person who has been in close contact with a individual with a confirmed infection, or who may have been to a location of a disease outbreak and is exhibiting symptoms of the infection.

An assessment of an individual's physical, mental, or emotional condition; information can be gathered from multiple sources, including physical exam, personal interview and observation, medical history, laboratory and imaging tests.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An unvarying or habitual method or procedure.: The systematic collection, analysis, and interpretation of health data on an ongoing basis.

Concepts.definition: An unvarying or habitual method or procedure.
The systematic collection, analysis, and interpretation of health data on an ongoing basis.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The act of going from one place to another.: A secure, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)-controlled web network that connects public health professionals involved in identifying, investigating, and responding to public health threats. It provides rapid reporting, immediate notification, editorial support, and coordination between public health professionals during public health investigations.

Concepts.definition: The act of going from one place to another.

A secure, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)-controlled web network that connects public health professionals involved in identifying, investigating, and responding to public health threats. It provides rapid reporting, immediate notification, editorial support, and coordination between public health professionals during public health investigations.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.: The process of identifying and tracking individuals who may have been exposed to a person with an infectious disease in order to monitor and disrupt disease spread.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
The process of identifying and tracking individuals who may have been exposed to a person with an infectious disease in order to monitor and disrupt disease spread.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
